backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence mappings between features, source files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend Tambola feature files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide describing prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no rules defined.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up meta tags, favicon, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component wiring game state, voice settings, auto-draw logic, and layout structure.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: Game controls UI providing draw, quick reset, voice toggle, and auto-draw settings with cooldown handling.
Scrollable panel displaying called numbers in reverse order with color-coded tiles.
Section combining last-number display, auto-draw pause/resume button, and call history panel.
Dialog for recording, playing, and deleting host voice clips for numbers 1–90 using IndexedDB storage.
Visual card showing the latest drawn number or a placeholder, with completion messaging when all numbers are called.
Provides a New Game button with dialogs for incomplete board warnings and confirmation before resetting or starting a new game.
Renders a 1–90 grid highlighting numbers that have been called.
Allows users to enter up to 15 numbers and verifies them against called numbers, showing success or error results.
Displays controls and status indicators for voice announcements, including TTS initialization and troubleshooting hints.
Shows troubleshooting tips when voice announcements fail, especially in Android wrapper environments.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: Manages saving, loading, and creating initial Tambola game and auto-draw settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: Defines Tambola game state, auto-draw settings, persisted data types, and game action identifiers.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: Custom hook handling Tambola game logic including drawing, undoing, resetting, auto-draw control, and persistence.
frontend/src/features/tambola/verify/par: Empty placeholder file for parsing typed number input.
Parses spoken transcripts into up to 15 unique numbers (1–90) by interpreting digits and number words, including compounds.
Helpers for loading SpeechSynthesis voices and performing TTS initialization, warm-up, and English voice selection.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/type: Defines voice settings and playback step types for TTS and recorded-number announcements.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useH: React hook that records microphone audio, stores clips in IndexedDB, and handles recording state and errors.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useS: React hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition to capture transcripts with error handling and state management.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useV: Controls announcing numbers using TTS and recordings, building step sequences and handling playback and fallbacks.
React hook managing session-only voice settings including enabled state, reading mode, and source priority.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useW: Initializes WebView-safe audio and TTS by unlocking audio, priming voices, and running a warm-up utterance.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/voic: Provides audio context unlocking and playback utilities for recorded audio blobs with cleanup and error handling.
IndexedDB storage helpers for saving, loading, deleting, and listing recorded voice clips for numbers 1–90.
Provides default session-only voice settings and clears any stored settings on startup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode overrides, and background styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts: Exports the current live application version and deployment date.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, plugins, animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, features, and pending feature requests for the voice‑recording app.
